ResumeParserData.Qualification: MBA in Finance  University of Manchester, Manchester, UK  2002 - 2004  BSc in Business Administration  University of Leeds, Leeds, UK  1998 - 2002
ResumeParserData.Certification: Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP)  Project Management Professional (PMP)

Requirements Gathering : Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather and document detailed business requirements, ensuring alignment with organizational goals. 
 Process Improvement : Identified inefficiencies in business processes and developed streamlined solutions, resulting in a 20% increase in operational efficiency. 
 Data Analysis : Conducted comprehensive data analysis using tools such as SQL and Tableau to support strategic decision-making.

Emma Richardson
Address : 45 Elm Street, Manchester, UK
Phone : +44 1234 567890

Personal Statement
Experienced Business Analyst with over 15 years of experience in the financial services industry, specializing in process improvement, data analysis, and project management. Adept at identifying business needs and delivering actionable solutions to enhance operational efficiency. Seeking to leverage extensive expertise and analytical skills to contribute to Barclays' strategic initiatives.

Senior Business Analyst
HSBC, Manchester, UK
January 2014 - Present
Requirements Gathering : Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather and document detailed business requirements, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
Process Improvement : Identified inefficiencies in business processes and developed streamlined solutions, resulting in a 20% increase in operational efficiency.
Data Analysis : Conducted comprehensive data analysis using tools such as SQL and Tableau to support strategic decision-making.
Project Management : Led multiple projects from conception to implementation, consistently delivering on time and within budget.
Stakeholder Communication : Maintained open communication with stakeholders, ensuring project objectives were clearly understood and met.
Report Generation : Prepared and presented detailed reports to senior management, highlighting key findings and recommendations.
Compliance and Risk Management : Ensured all business analysis activities adhered to regulatory requirements and internal policies.
Business Analyst
Lloyds Banking Group, Manchester, UK
June 2009 - December 2013
Gathered and analyzed business requirements to support the development of financial products.
Improved business processes through the implementation of innovative solutions, enhancing customer satisfaction.
Conducted data analysis to provide insights for strategic planning and performance improvement.
Managed projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to quality standards.
Communicated effectively with stakeholders to ensure project goals were achieved.
Developed comprehensive reports to communicate findings to senior leadership.
Junior Business Analyst
Santander, Manchester, UK
July 2004 - May 2009
Assisted in gathering and documenting business requirements.
Supported process improvement initiatives to enhance operational efficiency.
Conducted data analysis to support business decision-making.
Assisted in project management tasks, ensuring timely and successful project completion.
Maintained effective communication with stakeholders.

Education
MBA in Finance
University of Manchester, Manchester, UK
2002 - 2004
BSc in Business Administration
University of Leeds, Leeds, UK
1998 - 2002

Certifications
Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP) 
Project Management Professional (PMP) 

Skills
Analytical & Problem-Solving : Expert in identifying issues and developing effective solutions.
Data Analysis Tools : Proficient in Excel, SQL, and Tableau.
Project Management : Skilled in Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
Communication : Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Organizational : Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Personal Attributes
Analytical Mindset : Critical thinker with strong problem-solving abilities.
Collaborative Nature : Team player with excellent interpersonal skills.
Proactive Approach : Self-motivated and initiative-driven.
Customer Focus : Committed to understanding and meeting client needs.
